definitions.title: Hiph., Niph.
definitions.body: (NH Hiph., admonish, cf. Aram. [[זְהַר]] (Aph. Pa. etc.), zhar (Ar. zahara VIII. take care of, be mindful of is perh. Aram. loan-word, so TA cf. Lane).—Most identify with I. [[זהר]] = give light, enlighten, instruct, admonish; this possible, but not certain, mng. shine is late in Heb.; usual sense as given below is not enlighten, illumine mentally, but warn; v. also construction with two accusatives Ex 18:20);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהִזְהִיר]] consec. Ez Eze 33:3; sf. [[וְהִזְהִירהׁ]] 2Ki 6:10; 2 ms. [[הִזְהַרְתָּ]] Ez Eze 3:19, Eze 33:9, [[וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֫]] Ez Eze 3:17, Eze 33:7, [[וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֫ה]] Ex 18:20, sf. [[הִזְהַרְתּוֹ]] Ez Eze 3:18, Eze 3:20, Eze 3:21, [[וְהִזְהַרְתָּ]] consec. Ez Eze 3:17, Eze 33:7; [[וְהִזְהַרְתֶּם]] consec. 2Ch 19:10; Inf. cstr. [[לְהַזְהִיר]] Ez Eze 3:18, Eze 33:8; —instruct, teach, warn: Ex 18:20 (E) teach them ordinances (2 acc.); 2Ki 6:10 the place which ([[אֲשֶׁר]]) the man of God told him of ([[אָמַר־לוֹ]]) and warned him (sf.) of; elsewh. only Ez Ch; warn, give a warning to, alw. sq. acc. pers. only: Ez Eze 3:18, Eze 3:19, Eze 3:20, Eze 33:3; give them (acc.) a warning from me ([[מִפֶּנִּי]], ´[[י]] speaks) Ez Eze 3:17, Eze 33:7; warn the wicked ([[רָשָׁע]]) from (away from, [[מִן]]) his way Ez Eze 3:18, Eze 33:8, Eze 33:9; warn the righteous ([[חַדִּיק]]) Ez Eze 3:21 sq. Inf. in order that the righteous sin not, cf. 2Ch 19:10 sq. acc. pers. + final cl. c. [[וְ]].

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִזְêָהר]] Ez Eze 3:21, Eze 33:4, Eze 33:5, Eze 33:6; also [[נִזְâָהר]] v:Eze 33:5 (rd. perh. [[הִזְהִיר]], so We Sm Co); Imv. [[הִזׇּהֵר]] Ec 12:12; Inf. cstr. [[לְהִזׇּהֵר]] Ec 4:13; Pt. [[נִזְהָר]] Ps 19:12; —be instructed, admonished, warned (pass. of Hiph.):—[[גַּם־עַבְדְּךָ נִזְåָהר בָּהֶם]] Ps 19:12 yea thy servant, he is instructed (or warned) by them (i.e. lets himself be instructed or warned by the ´[[מִשְׁפְּטֵי י]] v:Ps 19:10); in Ez distinctly take warning, abs. Ez Eze 3:21 (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ) Eze 33:4, Eze 33:5; so Ec 12:2 and, more generally, [[אֲשֶׁר לאׁ יׇדַע לְהִזׇּהֵר]] Ec 4:13 who knoweth not how to take admonition; be warned, receive warning Ez Eze 33:6 (of people, c. [[לאׁ]], i.e. if no warning be given them), also MT v:Eze 33:5, but rd. perh. Hiph. (v. supr.) but he (i.e. the watchman) gave warning, he hath delivered his (own) soul.
